sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_IDC_VERIFY_GOV_ID.nextval from DUAL
insert into T_IDC_VERIFY_GOV ( ID, IDC_VERIFY_BASE_ID, PHOTO, CREATED_DATE, ERROR_CODE, ERROR_MSG ) values ( #id#, #idcVerifyBaseId#, #photo#, sysdate, #errorCode#, #errorMsg# )
sqlMap.update: update T_IDC_VERIFY_GOV set IDC_VERIFY_BASE_ID = #idcVerifyBaseId#, PHOTO = #photo#, CREATED_DATE = #createdDate#, ERROR_CODE = #errorCode#, ERROR_MSG = #errorMsg# where ID = #id#
sqlMap.select:
Select ID, IDC_VERIFY_BASE_ID as idcVerifyBaseId, photo, CREATED_DATE as createdDate, ERROR_CODE as errorCode, ERROR_MSG as errorMsg
From T_IDC_VERIFY_GOV Where IDC_VERIFY_BASE_ID=#idcVerifyBaseId#
sqlMap.update: Update T_IDC_VERIFY_GOV Set PHOTO=#photo# Where IDC_VERIFY_BASE_ID=#idcVerifyBaseId#
